Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
ComputerApplication.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Inventory class allow owner to perform different action that help in keeping track of computers Assignment (1)
Author:
krupa Maisuriya written by : Krupa - 2394498

    changeAttribute(int index)
    changeAttribute method prompt the user which attribute they wish to change by displaying the menu for the particular computer store in array.

    findCheaperThan(double price)
    findCheaperThan used to search all the computers that have less than particular price enter by the owner

    findComputersBy(String brand)
    findComputersBy used to search all the computers by brand name
    static boolean
    isValidPassword()
    isValidpassword will validate the password enter by the user with ownerPassword attribute value password is required for two main menu options only The computerstore owner has 3 tries to enter the correct password.

    main method to compile
    static void
    mainMenu()
    mainMenu method prompt the action list 1.Enter new computers (password required) 2.Change information of a computer (password required) 3.Display all computers by a specific brand 4.Display all computers under a certain a price 5.Quit and based on that allow owner to choice the action based on owner choice that action will be performed to keep track

    storeInventoryInFile store all the data of inventory in text file

    • findComputersBy

      public static void findComputersBy(String brand)
      findComputersBy used to search all the computers by brand name
      Parameters:
      brand - takes brand name value as a parameter which accept the string value

    • findCheaperThan

      public static void findCheaperThan(double price)
      findCheaperThan used to search all the computers that have less than particular price enter by the owner
      Parameters:
      price - takes price value as a parameter which accept the double value

    • storeInventoryInFile

      public static void storeInventoryInFile()
      storeInventoryInFile store all the data of inventory in text file

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu()
      mainMenu method prompt the action list 1.Enter new computers (password required) 2.Change information of a computer (password required) 3.Display all computers by a specific brand 4.Display all computers under a certain a price 5.Quit and based on that allow owner to choice the action based on owner choice that action will be performed to keep track

    • changeAttribute

      public static void changeAttribute(int index)
      changeAttribute method prompt the user which attribute they wish to change by displaying the menu for the particular computer store in array. (brand , model , SN , price and quit this operation and go back to the main menu) based on choice allow user to modify the attribute value by entering the value
      Parameters:
      index - accepts the index of computer store in array

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword()
      isValidpassword will validate the password enter by the user with ownerPassword attribute value password is required for two main menu options only The computerstore owner has 3 tries to enter the correct password. After the 3rd illegal entry displaying the main meny
      Returns:
      type is boolean if the password is valid than it will return true else false

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      main method to compile
      Parameters:
      args - accept string array element
